contents:
查一下源码不就知道了
https://pincongbot.github.io/Pincong-SQL/
里面输入这个
select * from aws_users_group

结果，略去了权限，大概就是20威望能踩，40威望能减别人威望


group_id type custom group_name reputation_lower reputation_higer reputation_factor

2 0 0 "前台管理员" 0 0 0

3 0 0 "未验证会员" 0 0 0

4 0 0 "普通会员" 0 0 0

100 1 0 "lv0" -2147483648 0 0

101 1 0 "lv1" 0 1 0

102 1 0 "lv2" 1 5 0

103 1 0 "lv3" 5 10 0

104 1 0 "lv4" 10 20 0

99 0 0 "游客" 0 0 0

106 1 1 "lv6" 40 200 1

107 1 1 "lv7" 200 2147483647 1
